name: Slaylight
description:
Slaylight is a minimalistic, top down maze-survival game currently in development.

The objective of the game is simple. Escape the maze whilst taking on a range of enemies. Avoid walking into death zones and fight against shooting AI.

Slaylight is fast paced and requires quick thinking, taking a wrong turn can have deadly consequences.

Controls

WASD - move

Mouse – shoot

Development

This is an early release of Slaylight. Multiplayer and multiple levels are coming in the next update I just have a few bugs to iron out. Also coming in future updates are:

  • -Traps and Puzzles
  • -Difficulty adjustments
  • -Map customisation

Support
